events.name: Upstream activities
events.wd_description: Mining for required raw materials, including critical materials such as cobalt, lithium, nickel, manganese, and graphite.
events.description: Mining for required raw materials, including critical materials such as cobalt, lithium, nickel, manganese, and graphite.

events.name: Midstream activities
events.wd_description: Refining and smelting of raw mineral ores with heat or chemical treatment to achieve the high-purity materials required for batteries.
events.description: Refining and smelting of raw mineral ores with heat or chemical treatment to achieve the high-purity materials required for batteries.

events.name: Downstream activities
events.wd_description: Processing the refined materials into usable forms for battery production.
events.description: Processing the refined materials into usable forms for battery production.
